text: From the day in which thou did stand before the Lord thy God in Horeb, when the Lord spoke to me saying, Call together the people unto me, that they may hear my words, and may learn to fear me all the time that they live on the earth, and may teach their children.

segments.text: From the day in which thou did stand before the Lord thy God in Horeb, when the Lord spoke
to me saying, Call together the people unto me, that they may hear my words, and may learn
to fear me all the time that they live on the earth, and may teach their children.
